overview: As Vice President, Group Sales Manager, Trade, at News America Marketing, Ginny manages a team responsible for major West Coast retailers and Consumer Package Goods Customer Marketing Teams. Ginny began her career at News America Marketing in 2002 as an Account Coordinator and has held a variety of sales positions in the Los Angeles, San Francisco and New York offices managing relationships with CPGs such as Del Monte Foods, Nestle, Reckitt Benckiser, Dannon, Bayer Consumer Care and Revlon Cosmetics. Ginny was recognized as the 2006 Western Division Salesperson of the Year. She received her BA in Communication from the University of Southern California.

milestones.description: named 2006 Western Division Salesperson of the Year
